name: ZombieTime (il_Grigio)
description:
Gameplay

You are the zombie king and your objective is to defeat the human army while being careful of the sunrise.

You have a zombie army that will grow each night for every human you killed the night before, if one of your zombies gets killed it's not a big problem, that zombie will be back the next night, but if the sun burns them they will not come back, to save them just press E while near them and they will save themself by digging underground.

Be careful not to be killed by humans, that will bring you to the losing screen.

Every night there will be a human with a red shirt, that should be your main objective, if killed, your zombies will get stronger during the following nights, but if kept alive the humans will become stronger. You can rederect nearby zombies by aiming on a human and pressing Right click.

Look at the stars, white stars will lead you in the avarage position of the humans, while green stars will show you where the nearest zombie is.

ControlsMove with WASD, run with shift, rotate camera with mouse, attack with left click, rederect your zombies with right click, protect your zombies from the sun with E.
This is my first ever solo Game Jam, with the only help in the music by Alice Casati.
